statements: SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE incident_id = 100
SELECT description, reported_by, date FROM incidents WHERE status = 'Open'
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT incident_id, date, status FROM incidents WHERE reported_by = 'John Doe'
SELECT location, reported_by FROM incidents WHERE status = 'Closed' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT incident_id, date, location, description, reported_by, status FROM incidents WHERE status='Open';
SELECT incident_id, date, location FROM incidents WHERE date>'2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS num_incidents FROM incidents GROUP BY location HAVING num_incidents > 1 ORDER BY num_incidents DESC;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE reported_by IN ('John Doe', 'Jane Smith') AND status='Closed' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT incident_id, description, location FROM incidents;
SELECT incident_date, description FROM incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM investigation WHERE investigator = 'John Doe';
SELECT incident_id, findings FROM investigation WHERE corrective_actions IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT description, location FROM incidents WHERE employee_involved IS NOT NULL ORDER BY incident_id ASC;

SELECT i.incident_id, i.incident_date, inv.investigator FROM incidents AS i INNER JOIN investigation AS inv ON i.incident_id = inv.incident_id WHERE inv.findings LIKE '%serious%' ORDER BY i.incident_date ASC;
SELECT description, employee_involved FROM incidents WHERE description ILIKE '%safety%' AND location IN ('Warehouse', 'Office') ORDER BY incident_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_incidents, AVG(incident_id) AS avg_incident_id FROM incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-07-01';
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT location, date_occurred FROM incidents;
SELECT * FROM witnesses WHERE witness_id = 1;
SELECT name, statement FROM witnesses WHERE incident_id = 5;
SELECT incident_id, date_occurred, location, description FROM incidents WHERE location = 'Street A';
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE date_occurred = '2022-01-15';
SELECT incident_id, location FROM incidents WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT * FROM incidents ORDER BY date_occurred DESC;
SELECT i.incident_id, w.name AS witness_name, i.description FROM incidents i JOIN witnesses w ON i.incident_id = w.incident_id;
SELECT i.*, inv.name AS investigator_name FROM incidents i JOIN investigators inv ON i.location = inv.department;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE classification = 'High';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, description FROM incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT reported_by, COUNT(*) FROM incidents GROUP BY reported_by;
SELECT name, position, department FROM employees WHERE start_date < '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, description FROM incidents WHERE classification = 'High';
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT e.name, e.position, c.action_description, c.completion_date FROM employees e JOIN corrective_actions c ON e.employee_id = c.incident_id;
SELECT i.investigator, i.status, c.action_description, e.name FROM investigation i JOIN corrective_actions c ON i.incident_id = c.incident_id JOIN employees e ON c.responsible_person = e.name;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, description, location, reported_by FROM IncidentReports;
SELECT * FROM InvestigationTeam ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT note_id, investigator_name, note, timestamp FROM InvestigatorNotes WHERE incident_id = 123456;
SELECT action_id, action_description, responsible_party FROM CorrectiveActions WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Evidence LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports ORDER BY incident_date DESC, reported_by ASC;
SELECT team_name, lead_investigator FROM InvestigationTeam WHERE location = 'Headquarters';
SELECT incident_id, note_id, note FROM InvestigatorNotes WHERE note LIKE '%important%' AND investigator_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT action_description, due_date FROM CorrectiveActions WHERE responsible_party = 'Jane Smith' AND due_date > CURDATE();
SELECT * FROM Evidence WHERE incident_id = 12345 LIMIT 5 OFFSET 5;
